item.title: Why is Bioconductor awesome
item.description: I love Bioconductor Since its early ages, Bioconductor has gone very far. I’ve been on board for the past 7-ish years (I think), I use it every day, and every day, I think about how much I love it. Some reasons… I love Bioconductor for many reasons, some of them being GenomicRanges, SummarizedExperiment, DESeq2, and of course the amazing team. But today, one reason which I want to discuss in more depth is the Annotation Hub.
